alert.note: Alert for Hand; Hyde (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 7:38AM MST until November 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to four tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of freezing rain and drizzle. * WHERE...Hyde and Hand Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
